item.title: Dalmatian Waters to the Balkan Peaks
item.description: Our time in Italy was short due to the Shengen Visa.

item.title: A Taste of Italy
item.description: Before we dive into Italy, Switzerland didn’t come to a complete close.

item.title: Adventuring Leisurely through Switzerland
item.description: We’re getting closer to a year’s worth of travel. It had been close to 10 months abroad when we entered Switzerland.

item.title: Walking from Portugal to Spain
item.description: After the exotic yet tiresome country of Morocco, it was a relaxing short stay in Seville, Spain.

item.title: Contrast in Spain and Morocco
item.description: We said goodbye to paradise with 4 layovers and 20 hours of traveling.

item.title: Yog-Urf-Ving in Indonesia
item.description: After exploring the concrete jungles of Malaysia, it was well planned to get back to nature.

item.title: Concrete Jungles of Malaysia
item.description: Our Thailand Visa was up on April 23rd and our flight to Bali was on May 2nd thus we had 8ish days to kill in another neighboring country.

item.title: Hopping Around Thailand
item.description: It was a night and day difference entering Thailand after a 2 day slow boat ride from Luang Probang in Laos.

item.title: Adventuring in Laos
item.description: It was easy to book a bus from Siem Reap to Don Det island in Laos but it came at a price and I'm not talking about money.

item.title: Discovering Cambodia
item.description: After spending 2 months in Vietnam, we switched gears and started traveling a little faster.

item.title: Angkor Wat Bike Guide
item.description: 1-2 day bike guide to the Angkor Wat Complex. Instead of hiring a tuk tuk or a guided group trip, bike the complex on your own terms visiting temples, ruins, and monuments.

item.title: Northern Vietnam Motorbike Guide
item.description: Buying: First of all, it's pretty sweet to say you owned a bike in Vietnam.

item.title: 2 Months in Vietnam
item.description: There was excitement in our bones once again at the thought of getting back to living life on the road after a refreshing month of comfort and recharging in Saipan.

item.title: Holidays on Saipan
item.description: Originally we were planning on Ton Sai beach in Thailand to spend our holiday month.

item.title: 17 Day Annapurna Circuit Trek Guide
item.description: DescriptionGear and ClothingGPS TrackDay to Day Guide14-15 day trek through the iconic Annapurna Conservation Area on the Annapurna Circuit.

item.title: Touring Taiwan
item.description: After the chaos of North India, we found arriving in Taiwan a stark contrast of efficiency and cleanliness.

item.title: Beautiful Chaos of North India
item.description: We went to bed early on our last night in Nepal since we would have to wake up at 4:00am for our private taxi to the Nepal-India border to catch a bus to Varanasi.

item.title: Trekking in Nepal
item.description: Kathmandu Conglomerates of black electrical wire line the sky, intertwined with colorful, dusty prayer flags above Thamel streets as the sound of vendors playing the sarangi (Nepali violin) fill the air in between the hustle and bustle of the city.

item.title: Mysore Yoga Student Guide
item.description: The intentions of this guide are for new incoming yoga students or individuals intending to stay for longer periods of time in Mysore, specifically in Gokulam.

item.title: Yoga in India
item.description: It's been 45 days since we left Portland. Bangalore to Mysore, Mysore to Goa, Goa to Kathmandu, and Kathmandu to Pokhara.

item.title: Departure
item.description: For years, we have dreamt apart, then together. Dreamt of experiences awaiting us.
